name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026 Festival Profile**  

Pinkpop 2026 is set to light up the festival scene from June 19–21 with an impressive lineup of 32 artists spanning a diverse range of genres. Alternative Rock leads the charge with eight acts, followed closely by Pop and Indie Rock, ensuring a dynamic blend of crowd-pleasing sounds. The festival showcases an eclectic mix of styles, from Electropop and Punk Rock to Grunge and Rave Rock, reflecting its commitment to musical variety and innovation.  

The artist roster highlights international appeal, with performers from the United Kingdom and the United States leading the pack (nine artists each), alongside notable representation from the Netherlands (seven artists) and other countries like Germany, Canada, and Australia. While male-led acts dominate (20 of 32), there is a healthy presence of female (eight) and mixed-gender (four) groups, showcasing a growing gender diversity in the lineup. However, representation of people of color remains an area for growth, with only one artist fitting this category at this year’s event.  

With an average artist rating of 6.88 and every act boasting Spotify links, attendees can expect a solid mix of highly rated and accessible performers. Pinkpop 2026 promises a celebration of both emerging and established talent, with a strong focus on alternative and indie sounds, making it a must-attend event for music lovers seeking a blend of familiar favorites and new discoveries.
